business.name: Storm Guard Roofing
business.tagline: Cannock's Most Reliable Roofer with 18 Years of Experience
business.description: As the leading roofer in Cannock, we service a 20-mile radius including Telford, Dudley, Tamworth, and Stoke-on-Trent, bringing over 18 years of experience to every job. From full roof replacements and emergency repairs to specialised installations like rubber, felt, slate, and fibreglass roofing, we've got every angle covered. Whether it's a dormer window, chimney repair, or a full warm roof construction – we deliver professional results, high standards, and complete peace of mind for property owners throughout Cannock and surrounding areas.
business.mission: Our mission is to provide high-quality, long-lasting roofing solutions with honesty, professionalism, and care – protecting homes and businesses across Staffordshire, one roof at a time.

coreValues.title: Trust
coreValues.description: We've built our reputation over 18 years by being honest, dependable, and delivering what we promise.

coreValues.title: Quality Workmanship
coreValues.description: Every job is done with care, precision, and attention to detail – no shortcuts, ever.

coreValues.title: Customer Commitment
coreValues.description: From the first call to the final clean-up, we treat every property like it's our own and every customer like a neighbour.

team.name: James Saunders
team.bio: With over 20 years of experience in the roofing industry, James leads our team with expertise and dedication to quality craftsmanship.

team.name: Robert Simmons
team.bio: Robert's technical knowledge and attention to detail ensure that every project meets the highest standards of quality and performance.

team.name: Emma Thompson
team.bio: Emma oversees day-to-day operations, ensuring that all projects are completed on time, within budget, and to our exacting standards.

team.name: David Wilson
team.bio: David brings over 15 years of hands-on experience to every project, ensuring the highest quality workmanship.

testimonials.quote: Very professional, very polite and the quality of their work is outstanding. They took their time and didn't rush to finish the job. Job was done at the highest standard. Very happy with all the work.
testimonials.author: Verified Customer

testimonials.quote: Thank you StormGuard! Amos was prompt, honest and professional when he came to look at the job. Well prepared with a drone to review the area and was able to show me the problem. Booked in for the next day, he and his partner carried out the work expertly.
testimonials.author: Verified Customer

testimonials.quote: Really pleased with the work done. Very efficient; gave clear information on the work to be done, easy to make arrangements for the date of work and how long it would take. Cleared up very well. Would highly recommend Amos and Stormguard.
testimonials.author: Verified Customer

testimonials.quote: Amos and his team were professional and did a great job repairing my roof. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Amos was trustworthy and reliable and did what he said he would do to get the job done as agreed. Very happy with the job and performed to a good quality.
testimonials.author: Verified Customer

testimonials.quote: Brilliant, speedy, friendly service, the team kept me informed throughout the process, and left the property nice and tidy afterwards.
testimonials.author: Verified Customer

testimonials.quote: Amos was very quick to reply to any messages and came the following day to check the roof and provide a quote. Very pleased with all work carried out and will use in the future for other planned work.
testimonials.author: Verified Customer

faqSection.title: FAQ About Our Roofer Services in Cannock
faqSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our professional roofing services in Cannock

faqs.question: What makes StormGuard the best roofer in Cannock?
faqs.answer: As the premier roofer in Cannock, StormGuard combines 18+ years of experience with full insurance coverage, professional qualifications, and countless positive reviews from satisfied customers. Our roofing team brings local knowledge, expert craftsmanship, and responsive service to every project, whether it's an emergency repair or complete roof replacement. We're deeply connected to the Cannock community and committed to delivering exceptional roofing solutions that protect homes and businesses throughout the area.

faqs.question: Why should I choose a local roofer in Cannock?
faqs.answer: A local roofer in Cannock understands the specific roofing challenges in the area, can respond quickly for emergency repairs, and has established relationships with local suppliers for quality materials. At StormGuard Roofing, we've been serving Cannock for over 18 years, delivering reliable roofing work while contributing to the local community.

faqs.question: What qualifications should a professional roofer in Cannock have?
faqs.answer: When hiring a roofer in Cannock, look for proper insurance coverage, proven experience, professional certifications, and positive reviews from local customers. Our team at StormGuard Roofing meets all these requirements and more, ensuring your roofing project is in safe, capable hands.

faqs.question: How do I know if I need a roof repair or complete replacement?
faqs.answer: Signs that you might need roofing work include missing or damaged tiles, leaks, sagging areas, increased energy bills, and a roof that's over 20-25 years old. Our professional roofers can conduct a thorough inspection of your Cannock property and provide honest recommendations for repair work or full replacement based on the condition of your roof.

faqs.question: Do you provide quotes for roofing projects in Cannock?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide free, detailed quotes for all roofing projects in Cannock and surrounding areas. Our quotes include a breakdown of materials, labor costs, and project timeline. We believe in transparent pricing with no hidden charges, allowing you to make an informed decision about your roofing project.

faqs.question: What types of roofing services do you offer in Cannock?
faqs.answer: We offer an extensive range of roofing services in Cannock including pitched roof installation and repair, flat roofing systems (EPDM rubber, felt, fiberglass, single ply membrane), leadwork installation, chimney repairs and installation, roof windows and dormers, emergency repairs, and commercial roofing solutions. Our professional team is experienced with all roofing types including slate, tile, ridged systems, dry verge and ridge, asphalt, and warm roof construction for both residential and commercial properties.

faqs.question: How long does a typical roofing project take in Cannock?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary depending on the scope of work, property size, and weather conditions. Small repairs may take 1-2 days, while complete roof replacements typically take 1-2 weeks. At StormGuard Roofing, we work efficiently while maintaining high-quality standards on every roofing project in Cannock.
